backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko backend actor with no logic; no changes needed for mainnet.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing navigation reordering referencing frontend navigation file.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file mapping frontend source paths to short human-written summaries.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Mainnet deployment checklist outlining build and verification steps for the frontend canister.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS variables and theming definitions for light/dark modes and brand palette.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML template loading fonts, favicon, metadata, and mounting the React app.
frontend/RELEASE_NOTES.md: Release notes for v1.0.0 detailing deployed features, routing, configuration, and smoke tests.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root App component applying ThemeProvider and TanStack Router.
frontend/src/components/brand/BrandButto: Branded wrapper around shadcn Button providing primary, secondary, and accent variants.
Brand logo component with image fallback to text when logo loading fails.
frontend/src/components/content/ContentR: Renders content sections with support for headings, lists, emphasis blocks, and link-list grids.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Footer layout showing brand logo and navigation links derived from navigationConfig.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteHeade: Renders the main site header with navigation, dropdowns, mobile menu handling, and a solutions mega menu tied to hover and scroll-sync state.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Wraps the app layout with header, footer, and scroll-sync provider, rendering routed content in the main area.
frontend/src/components/layout/Solutions: Displays a two-column solutions mega menu with category previewing and lists services based on hover or active category.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSec: Shows the homepage hero with background image, headline, description, and primary navigation buttons.
Maps page and service identifiers to their source Google Docs URLs for manual content reference.
frontend/src/content/contentTypes.ts: Defines TypeScript interfaces for structured page content including blocks, sections, and link items.
frontend/src/content/pages.ts: Provides page content definitions for solutions and category subpages using structured blocks and generated service links.
frontend/src/content/solutionServicePage: Contains PageContent objects for individual solution service pages with overview, features, and benefits sections.
frontend/src/content/solutionServices.ts: Defines the list of solution service definitions mapping pageIds to titles, routes, and categories.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the current Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useDropdownHoverRegio: Tracks pointer position across trigger and dropdown panel to keep dropdown open until the pointer leaves both regions.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/usePageTitle.ts: Updates the document title with brand-aware formatting and restores the previous title on unmount.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder module for future backend queries with no current functionality.
frontend/src/hooks/useSolutionsActiveCat: Observes category sections and determines the active one based on visibility with hysteresis to avoid flicker.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind base styles and extensive CSS variables for light and dark theme color systems.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/ContentPage.tsx: Renders generic content pages with themed styling, page titles, and optional banner handling with fallback logic.
frontend/src/pages/CustomDomainPage.tsx: Provides instructions for configuring a custom domain, including DNS setup steps and hostname copy functionality.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Displays the homepage with a hero section and a grid of AV solution categories linking to detailed pages.
frontend/src/pages/NotFoundPage.tsx: Shows a 404 error page with an illustration and a button linking back to the homepage.
Lists all solution categories with a hero banner, scroll-synced sections, and links to category and service pages.
frontend/src/router/router.tsx: Defines the application's routing structure, mapping root, solution, industry, and dynamic service routes to their components.
frontend/src/site/brand.ts: Exports brand metadata including name, domain, logo, and contact information for consistent site-wide use.
frontend/src/site/industryThemes.ts: Contains theme color mappings for industry pages and a helper to retrieve an industry's theme by page ID.
frontend/src/site/navigation.ts: Defines navigation item structure and exports full site navigation config plus a helper to flatten all routes.
frontend/src/site/pageBannerResolver.ts: Resolves page banner images by filename convention with fallback to a predefined banner map.
frontend/src/site/pageBanners.ts: Provides a mapping of page IDs to their banner image paths and alt text.
frontend/src/site/pageThemes.ts: Returns theme settings for solution and industry pages based on predefined theme rules.
frontend/src/solutions/solutionsScrollSy: Implements a React context to track the active solutions category and reset it when leaving the solutions page.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS with custom colors, fonts, animations, and plugin settings.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, known issues, and feature requests for navigation reordering.
